alert.note: Alert for Bamberg; Calhoun; Central Orangeburg; Clarendon; Lee; Northwestern Orangeburg; Richland; Southeastern Orangeburg; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 10 at 10:24PM EST by NWS Columbia
info.description: At 1021 PM EST, Doppler radar was indicating strong winds behind a cold front. ...Boaters on Lake Marion Should Seek Safe Harbor... HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sumter, Orangeburg, Manning, Bamberg, Denmark, Bishopville, South Sumter, Shaw Air Base, Brookdale, McEntire Air Base, St. Matthews, Holly Hill, Branchville, Summerton, Bowman, Eastover, Elloree, Mulberry, Orangeburg County Airport, and Congaree National Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 104 and 123. Interstate 26 near mile marker 127, and between mile markers 130 and 169. Interstate 95 between mile markers 85 and 146. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If on or near Lake Marion, boaters should seek safe port. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these winds pass.

area.areaDesc: Bamberg; Calhoun; Central Orangeburg; Clarendon; Lee; Northwestern Orangeburg; Richland; Southeastern Orangeburg; Sumter
